text:
Tiney.co | Full-time | Remote or London | NodeJS + React

tiney.co is a new B-Corp startup from an experienced founding team building a new community in the Early Years education and childcare sector. We've recently closed a Â£1m angel funding round and are looking for NodeJS and React/React Native developers to join the team and help build out our initial platform.

Apply here: https://workinstartups.com/job-board/job/73786/lead-engineer... and https://workinstartups.com/job-board/job/71567/reactreact-na... or email jobs@tiney.co
